sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable react/jsx-no-duplicate-props */ import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {postContact, clearCurrent} from '../../redux/actions/customerActions' import FormLoader from './FormLoading' import '../../styles/customerForm.css' const CustomerForm = ({loading, current, error_msg, alert_error, postCustomer, clearCurrent}) => { const [contact, setContact] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', abilities: '', type: 'personal' }) const { name, email, phone, abilities, type } = contact useEffect(()=>{ if(current !== null){ setContact(current) }else{ setContact({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', abilities: '', type: 'personal' }) } }, [current]) const onChange = e => setCustomer({...customer, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}); const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() setContact({ first_name: '', last_name: '', address: '', address2: '', city: '', state: '', zip: '', email: '', phone: '', }) postCustomer(customer) } return (

{current? 'Edit Contact': 'Add Contact'}

{loading && } {alert_error && }
Preferred first and last name.
Preferred first and last name.
{phone && max: {9 - phone.length}}
{abilities && max: {250 - abilities.length}}
Contact Types
{current && }
) } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ loading: state.customer.loadingForm, error_msg: state.contact.error_msg, current: state.contact.current }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, {postCustomer, clearCurrent})(CustomerForm)
